author: Hope is Viral
text: The author of this book visited our school leaving all who heard her voice blessed.  One of few female pilots. Thanks Ms. Carol for continuing the legacy of Bessie Coleman & for inspiring the next generation! https://t.co/AhC5LkYyz2

author: Hope is Viral
text: Finally received a communication from @IRS. Allegedly I will get refund in August. Still no word on CTC, interest or stimulus money, but at least I can buy a week's worth of groceries and  school supplies for my child before getting further behind on rent

author: Hope is Viral
text: My horoscope said I am experiencing financial delays; been waiting 4 (four) months for my income tax refund. Thanks @IRSnews
